job.title: Remote Senior Site Reliability Engineer, SRE / DevOps Engineer
job.description:
Remote Unlimited PTO, latest frameworks, consistently voted best places to work!

This Jobot Job is hosted by Amber Heigerick

Are you a fit? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Apply" button and sending us your resume.

Salary $130,000 - $185,000 per year

A Bit About Us

We are a leading financial technology company that is looking to add a Senior SRE / DevOps Engineer to our dynamic team! The team is crucial to building/deployment/monitoring automation of products for our cloud offering using cutting edge technologies.



Why join us?


We've got an amazing track record of success and we foster ongoing innovation. So you get all the benefits of a proven, growing company, while enjoying a very entrepreneurial culture. We value being collaborative, open, respectful and at all levels of the organization -- this is our "no jerks" policy.

Job Details

The Senior Site Reliability Engineers / DevOps Enginner is a key member of our fast-growing and high-performing team;
  • You will, research, define and architect solutions for Source Control, Build and Deployment automation, Continuous Integration, Environment Monitoring, and general developer tools and provide strategic and tactical directions.
  • Build software releases and testing new code; as an automation expert using tools that automate the development, testing and integration of software releases/fixes
  • Design, develop, and implement software that defines and evolves our infrastructure.
  • Troubleshoot production issues and coordinate with the development team to streamline code deployment.
  • Implement automation tools and frameworks (CI/CD pipelines).
  • Analyze code and communicate detailed reviews to development teams to ensure a marked improvement in applications and the timely completion of projects.
  • Collaborate with team members to improve the company's engineering tools, systems and procedures, and data security.
  • Optimize the company's computing architecture.
  • Kubernetes Google Kubernetes Engine, Helm/Flux, Gitops, and Rancher.
Cloud Automation and Management Terraform, Cloud Formation, or Pulumi in any of GCP, AWS, or Azure. Experience building and enforcing IAM strategies.

Configuration Management Saltstack, Chef, or Puppet.

CI/CD Building CI/CD pipelines, especially Docker-based pipelines (e.g., CircleCI, Buddy.works, CodeFresh, Jenkins X, ArgoCD).

Application Alerting and Monitoring ElasticSearch, Kibana, Prometheus, Grafana, Datadog
